p: We additionally evaluated the pathogenicity of M mut and M-PA mut viruses in the same way indicated above and the results show that the introduction of the M1+M2 mutations on the CAL wt or PA mut backgrounds led to clear virus attenuation in mice, as the LD50 increased from 1 x 10 5 or 3 x 10 3, respectively, to >5 x 10 5 in both cases ( Fig 7B). M-PA mut virus pathogenicity was greater than that of M mut virus, as indicated by body weight loss after sublethal infection ( Fig 7C).
